inclusion.criterion: Frozen section biopsy proven anaplastic astrocytoma or glioblastoma multiforme
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient can receive second treatment of HSV-tk after 6 months
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Newly diagnosed anaplastic astrocytoma or glioblastoma demonstrated by frozen section biopsy
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: No evidence of other active malignancy (except squamous or basal cell skin cancers)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Signed informed consent to participate in the study
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Willing to provide biopsies as required by the study
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Adequate baseline organ function (serum creatinine < 1.5 mg/dL, T. bilirubin < 2.5 mg/dL, etc.)
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Prior treatment with immunomodulatory therapy, immunotherapy, and/or gene vector therapy in the past 3 months
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Any cytotoxic chemotherapy, RT, or immunotherapy or any investigational drug within 3 weeks of study treatment start
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has a history of anaplastic astrocytoma and is currently undergoing treatment. However, they have received prior treatment with high-dose steroids, which may trigger exclusion.
